channel.title: args on Andri Rakotomalala
channel.description: Recent content in args on Andri Rakotomalala

item.title: Type provider for command-line arguments (WIP)
item.description: Usage // set all possible switches // switches are all optional and unordered type CustomArgsParser = Andri.TypeProviders.CliParametersParser<"-switch2 -a -b -c"> [<EntryPoint>] let main args = let parsedArgs = CustomArgsParser(args) printfn "switch2: %s" (parsedArgs.switch2) // displays Option<string> = Some "11" myApp.exe -switch2 11 -b Source namespace Andri open System open System.Reflection open Microsoft.FSharp.Core.CompilerServices open Microsoft.FSharp.Quotations open Samples.FSharp.ProvidedTypes module utils = let argsToDict (args:string list) = Seq.append args ([""]) |> Seq.pairwise |> Seq.
